About Me


Arjun Vijayanathakurup(Arjun V), is a 20-year-old Web developer and cybersecurity enthusiast. He is currently pursuing his final year undergraduate degree at Amrita University, Amritapuri campus, Kollam, Kerala, India.

He is a highly motivated guy who is always full of energy to take any projects and tasks without any failure. He is an avid reader who loves to read lots of books and blogs. He has a passion towards security and works his was towards achieving a good professinal base in that stream. He loves Free Open source Softwares. He loves to research on different streams in computer science mainly Security, Machine Learning, Networking, Software development, Android

He started his journey as a web developer during his first year as an undergraduate student at Amrita University and later recognised his interest in cyber-security i.e finding flaws in web applications rather than creating them. He has worked on developing many softwares and applications. Most of his work can be found on his GitHub.

This platform is for him to express his views, ideas and write-ups based on his studies, Resesarch, experimentations and readings.

His current interests are:

  • Computer networks
  • Programming
  • Cyber-security
  • Android application development
  • Interet of Things
  • Machine learning
  • Web development
  • Algorithm

If you need any help on any development projects and any security advices, please do ping to me and we can work on it and if you want to talk to me just drop a message on my Instagram and we’ll grab a cup of coffee if necessary —
